verses.verse: For we <S%G1492>know<s%> that <S%G1437>if<s%> our <S%G1919>earthly<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G4636>tabernacle<s%> were <S%G2647>dissolved,<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3619>building<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> an <S%G3614>house<s%> not <S%G886>made<s%> with <S%G886>hands,<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> in the <S%G3772>heavens.<s%>
For in <S%G5129>this<s%> we <S%G4727>groan,<s%> <S%G1971>earnestly<s%> <S%G1971>desiring<s%> to be <S%G1902>clothed<s%> on with our <S%G3613>house<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is from <S%G3772>heaven:<s%>
<S%G1489>If<s%> so be that being <S%G1746>clothed<s%> we shall not be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1131>naked.<s%>

For we that are in <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G4636>tabernacle<s%> do <S%G4727>groan,<s%> being <S%G916>burdened:<s%> not for that we <S%G2309>would<s%> be <S%G1562>unclothed,<s%> but <S%G1902>clothed<s%> on, that <S%G2349>mortality<s%> might be <S%G2666>swallowed<s%> up of <S%G2222>life.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> he that has <S%G2716>worked<s%> us for the <S%G846>selfsame<s%> <S%G5124><s%> thing is <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> to us the <S%G728>earnest<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> we are <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2292>confident,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that, whilst we are <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G1736>home<s%> in the <S%G4983>body,<s%> we are <S%G1553>absent<s%> from the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%>
(For we <S%G4043>walk<s%> by <S%G4102>faith,<s%> not by <S%G1491>sight:<s%>)
We are <S%G2292>confident,<s%> I say, and <S%G2106>willing<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> to be <S%G1553>absent<s%> from the <S%G4983>body,<s%> and to be <S%G1736>present<s%> with the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G1352>Why<s%> we <S%G5389>labor,<s%> that, <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G1736>present<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1553>absent,<s%> we may be <S%G2101>accepted<s%> of him.

For we <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5319>appear<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> the <S%G968>judgment<s%> <S%G968>seat<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> that <S%G1538>every<s%> one may <S%G2865>receive<s%> the things done in his <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G4314>according<s%> to that he has <S%G4238>done,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> it be <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2556>bad.<s%>

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G5401>terror<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> we <S%G3982>persuade<s%> <S%G444>men;<s%> but we are <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> to <S%G2316>God;<s%> and I <S%G1679>trust<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> are <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4893>consciences.<s%>

For we <S%G4921>commend<s%> not <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to you, but <S%G1325>give<s%> you <S%G874>occasion<s%> to <S%G2745>glory<s%> <S%G5228>on<s%> our <S%G5228>behalf,<s%> that you may <S%G2192>have<s%> somewhat to answer them which <S%G2744>glory<s%> in <S%G4383>appearance,<s%> and not in <S%G2588>heart.<s%>
For <S%G1535>whether<s%> we be <S%G1839>beside<s%> ourselves, it is to <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> we be <S%G4993>sober,<s%> it is for <S%G5213>your<s%> cause.

For the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4912>constrains<s%> us; because we <S%G5124>thus<s%> <S%G2919>judge,<s%> that <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> for <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G599>dead:<s%>

And that he <S%G599>died<s%> for <S%G3956>all,<s%> that they which <S%G2198>live<s%> should not from now <S%G3371>on<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> but to him which <S%G599>died<s%> for them, and <S%G1453>rose<s%> <S%G1453>again.<s%>

<S%G5620>Why<s%> from now <S%G575>on<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> we <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh:<s%> <S%G1161>yes,<s%> <S%G1499>though<s%> we have <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> from now <S%G2089>on<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> we him <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more.<s%>

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man be in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> he is a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G2937>creature:<s%> <S%G744>old<s%> things are <S%G3928>passed<s%> away; <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things are <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2537>new.<s%>

And <S%G3956>all<s%> things are of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> has <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> us to <S%G1438>himself<s%> by <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and has <S%G1325>given<s%> to us the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> of <S%G2643>reconciliation;<s%>

To <S%G5613>wit,<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> was in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2644>reconciling<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> not <S%G3049>imputing<s%> their <S%G3900>trespasses<s%> to them; and has <S%G5087>committed<s%> to us the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2643>reconciliation.<s%>

<S%G3767>Now<s%> then we are <S%G4243>ambassadors<s%> for <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> as though <S%G2316>God<s%> did <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you by us: we <S%G1189>pray<s%> you in <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> <S%G5228>stead,<s%> be you <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For he has <S%G4160>made<s%> him to be <S%G266>sin<s%> for us, who <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G266>sin;<s%> that we might be <S%G1096>made<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in him.
